## **PR Title: \[Feature/Fix/Refactor/Experiment/Chore/etc.\] Brief Description**

## **Change Type**

- [ ] Feature  
- [ ] Bug Fix  
- [ ] Documentation

- [ ] Performance Improvement  
- [ ] Testing  
- [ ] Other (please specify)

## **Context & Motivation**

Describe the problem or feature in addition to a link to relevant issues. Explain what need this PR addresses and what benefits it brings.

## **Approach & Solution**

Describe how the change was implemented and the alternatives that were considered. Explain design decisions and tradeoffs that were made.

// Optional: Code snippets that illustrate key changes or design patterns used

* Dependencies introduced  
* Migration steps  
* Performance considerations  
* Security implications

Describe how you tested these changes. Include details of your testing environment and the tests you ran to verify your changes.

- [ ] Integration tests added/updated
